snippet.title: Bright Memory: Infinite Mobile - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Bright Memory: Infinite Mobile version will be released on January 17, It will be available on AppStore and GooglePlay for $4.99, store page will be released in a while.

Game is ported from the PC version and supports XBOX controllers, Virtual button customization, Gyroscope Aiming, and a maximum of 120 frames on Android devices.

Once again, we need to thank all the players who purchased the original version of Bright Memory Mobile.
